sqlMap.sql: select u.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID, u.PCL_STORE_CC_REQ_NO, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, d.DATA_DTL_NAME STORE_CANCEL_TYPE, u.AREA_NAME, to_char(u.BEG_SBUSS_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') BEG_SBUSS_DATE, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.CHANN_NAME, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.CHANN_TEL, u.BUSS_SCOPE, to_char(u.SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME from DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ u left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL d on u.STORE_CANCEL_TYPE = d.data_dtl_code
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ u

SELECT u.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID, u.PCL_STORE_CC_REQ_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, u.TERM_TYPE, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.CHANN_TEL, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.REITED_NUM, u.CHARGE_AREA, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, to_char(u.BEG_SBUSS_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') BEG_SBUSS_DATE, u.PERSON_CON, u.TEL, u.MOBILE, u.TAX, u.SALE_STORE_ID, u.SALE_STORE_NAME, u.ZONE_ID, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.BUSS_SCOPE, u.LOCAL_TYPE, to_char(u.SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE, d.DATA_DTL_NAME STORE_CANCEL_TYPE, u.REIT_AMOUNT_PS, u.ORG_REIT_AMOUNT, u.REITED_AMOUNT, u.ADDRESS, u.STATE, u.REQ_RSON, u.REMARK, u.CREATOR,u.CRE_NAME,to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPDATOR,u.UPD_NAME,to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.AUDIT_ID,u.AUDIT_NAME,to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.DEPT_ID,u.DEPT_NAME,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.LEDGER_ID,u.LEDGER_NAME, u.DEL_FLAG, u.BUSS_AREA, b.ATT_PATH FROM DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ u left join BASE_ATT b on u.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID = b.FROM_BILL_ID left join PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL d on u.STORE_CANCEL_TYPE = d.data_dtl_code WHERE u.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID = #SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID#

SELECT u.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID, u.PCL_STORE_CC_REQ_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, u.TERM_TYPE, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.CHANN_TEL, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.REITED_NUM, u.CHARGE_AREA, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, to_char(u.BEG_SBUSS_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') BEG_SBUSS_DATE, u.PERSON_CON, u.TEL, u.MOBILE, u.TAX, u.SALE_STORE_ID, u.SALE_STORE_NAME, u.ZONE_ID, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.BUSS_SCOPE, u.LOCAL_TYPE, to_char(u.SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE, u.STORE_CANCEL_TYPE, u.REIT_AMOUNT_PS, u.ORG_REIT_AMOUNT, u.REITED_AMOUNT, u.ADDRESS, u.STATE, u.REQ_RSON, u.REMARK, u.CREATOR,u.CRE_NAME,to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPDATOR,u.UPD_NAME,to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.AUDIT_ID,u.AUDIT_NAME,to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.DEPT_ID,u.DEPT_NAME,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.LEDGER_ID,u.LEDGER_NAME, u.DEL_FLAG, u.BUSS_AREA, b.ATT_PATH
FROM DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ u left join BASE_ATT b on u.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID = b.FROM_BILL_ID WHERE u.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID = #SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.update:
update ${SYSSCHEMA}.DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ
SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID = #SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID# PCL_STORE_CC_REQ_NO = #PCL_STORE_CC_REQ_NO# CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO# CHANN_NAME = #CHANN_NAME# TERM_NO = #TERM_NO# TERM_NAME = #TERM_NAME# TERM_TYPE = #TERM_TYPE# CHANN_PERSON_CON = #CHANN_PERSON_CON# CHANN_TEL = #CHANN_TEL# AREA_ID = #AREA_ID# AREA_NO = #AREA_NO# AREA_NAME = #AREA_NAME# AREA_MANAGE_ID = #AREA_MANAGE_ID# AREA_MANAGE_NAME = #AREA_MANAGE_NAME# AREA_MANAGE_TEL = #AREA_MANAGE_TEL# BEG_SBUSS_DATE = to_date(#BEG_SBUSS_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') PERSON_CON = #PERSON_CON# TEL = #TEL# MOBILE = #MOBILE# TAX = #TAX# SALE_STORE_ID = #SALE_STORE_ID# SALE_STORE_NAME = #SALE_STORE_NAME# ZONE_ID = #ZONE_ID# ZONE_ADDR = #ZONE_ADDR# BUSS_SCOPE = #BUSS_SCOPE# CHARGE_AREA = #CHARGE_AREA# LOCAL_TYPE = #LOCAL_TYPE# SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE = to_date(#SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') STORE_CANCEL_TYPE = #STORE_CANCEL_TYPE# REIT_AMOUNT_PS = #REIT_AMOUNT_PS# ORG_REIT_AMOUNT = #ORG_REIT_AMOUNT# REITED_NUM = #REITED_NUM# REITED_AMOUNT = #REITED_AMOUNT# ADDRESS = #ADDRESS# STATE = #STATE# REQ_RSON = #REQ_RSON# REMARK = #REMARK# BUSS_AREA = #BUSS_AREA#
UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPD_TIME = sysdate
where SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID = #SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ r where r.del_flag=0 and r.state='审核通过' and r.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID=#SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID#
select p.DATA_DTL_NAME from PROJECT_DATA_DICTIONARY_DTL p where p.DATA_DTL_CODE=#DATA_DTL_CODE#
select p.TERM_ID from DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ p where p.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID = #SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID#

select u.SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID, u.PCL_STORE_CC_REQ_NO, to_char(u.CRE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-DD') CRE_TIME, u.TERM_ID, u.TERM_NO, u.TERM_NAME, u.TERM_TYPE, to_char(u.BEG_SBUSS_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') BEG_SBUSS_DATE, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.CHANN_TEL, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, u.PERSON_CON, u.TEL, u.MOBILE, u.TAX, u.SALE_STORE_NAME, u.LOCAL_TYPE, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.BUSS_SCOPE, u.CHARGE_AREA, u.BUSS_AREA, to_char(u.SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-DD') SPCL_STORE_CANCEL_DATE, u.STORE_CANCEL_TYPE, u.REIT_AMOUNT_PS, u.REITED_NUM, u.REITED_AMOUNT, u.STATE, u.ADDRESS, u.REQ_RSON from DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ u
sqlMap.update:
update ${SYSSCHEMA}.DRP_SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ
DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# sysdate
where SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID = #SPCL_STORE_CC_REQ_ID#
